name: org.machanism.machai:assembly-maven-plugin
description: Assembly Maven Plugin (org.machanism.machai:assembly-maven-plugin) is a Maven plugin that provides the "assembly" goal to run an AI-assisted project assembly workflow over a target project directory (by default the Maven execution basedir). It performs two GenAI-driven phases: (1) library recommendation ("picking") using org.machanism.machai.bindex.Picker, where a natural-language prompt is read from a configurable file (default project.txt) or requested interactively, then a GenAI provider (default OpenAI:gpt-5-mini) recommends candidate libraries as org.machanism.machai.schema.Bindex entries; recommendations can be filtered by a minimum score threshold (default 0.9) and optionally use a registration/lookup endpoint (bindex.register.url) for bindex metadata. (2) project assembly using org.machanism.machai.bindex.ApplicationAssembly, where a separate GenAI provider (default OpenAI:gpt-5) applies changes to the project directory to integrate the selected libraries and produce an assembled project. The plugin integrates with the Machanism Machai ecosystem: it uses bindex-core for interpreting bindex.json metadata, GenAIProviderManager to resolve provider ids, and FunctionToolsLoader to attach function tools to providers. If the selected provider is interactive (not org.machanism.machai.ai.provider.none.NoneProvider), the plugin can continue in an interactive prompt loop until the user types "exit". Typical usage is from the Maven CLI or CI pipelines to scaffold/assemble projects and guide dependency/library selection via semantic search over bindex descriptions.

constructors.description: Creates a new Maven Mojo instance for the "assembly" goal. Configuration is provided via Maven @Parameter injection (system properties and plugin configuration). At execution time, the Mojo reads a natural-language assembly prompt from a file or interactive input, invokes a picker GenAI provider to recommend libraries (Bindex entries), and then invokes an assembly GenAI provider to apply changes to the project directory.

examples.description: Runs the "assembly" goal from the command line, configuring separate GenAI providers for picking and assembly, reading the prompt from project.txt, and requiring a minimum recommendation score of 0.9.

features.name: assembly
features.description: Implements the Maven "assembly" goal. Reads an assembly prompt from the configured file (assembly.prompt.file, default project.txt) or requests it interactively via org.codehaus.plexus.components.interactivity.Prompter. Initializes a configuration source (org.machanism.macha.core.commons.configurator.PropertiesConfigurator backed by bindex.properties). Resolves and configures a picker GenAI provider (pick.genai, default OpenAI:gpt-5-mini) using org.machanism.machai.ai.manager.GenAIProviderManager, sets the working directory to the Maven basedir, applies function tools via org.machanism.machai.ai.tools.FunctionToolsLoader, and uses org.machanism.machai.bindex.Picker to recommend org.machanism.machai.schema.Bindex artifacts. Filters recommendations by a minimum score (assembly.score, default 0.9), logs the recommended library ids and scores, then resolves and configures an assembly GenAI provider (assembly.genai, default OpenAI:gpt-5) and runs org.machanism.machai.bindex.ApplicationAssembly against the project directory to apply the changes. If the provider is interactive (not org.machanism.machai.ai.provider.none.NoneProvider), enters a prompt loop until the user types "exit". Wraps IO and prompting failures into MojoExecutionException.

examples.description: Runs the plugin goal with explicit providers for picking and assembly, reads the prompt from project.txt, and filters recommendations with score >= 0.9.
If the prompt file does not exist, the Mojo requests the prompt interactively from the user using the Maven/plexus prompter.
Runs the picker with an optional registration/lookup endpoint to resolve or register bindex metadata during library recommendation.

customizations.name: assembly.genai
customizations.description: System property / plugin configuration parameter selecting the GenAI provider id for the assembly phase (used to apply changes to the project). Resolved by org.machanism.machai.ai.manager.GenAIProviderManager. Default: OpenAI:gpt-5.

examples.description: Sets the GenAI provider used for the assembly phase.

customizations.name: pick.genai
customizations.description: System property / plugin configuration parameter selecting the GenAI provider id for the picker phase (used to recommend candidate libraries as Bindex entries). Resolved by org.machanism.machai.ai.manager.GenAIProviderManager. Default: OpenAI:gpt-5-mini.

examples.description: Sets the GenAI provider used for the recommendation (picker) phase.

customizations.name: assembly.prompt.file
customizations.description: System property / plugin configuration parameter specifying the text file that contains the natural-language assembly prompt. If the file does not exist, the prompt is requested interactively via org.codehaus.plexus.components.interactivity.Prompter. Default: project.txt.

examples.description: Reads the assembly prompt from project.txt.

customizations.name: assembly.score
customizations.description: System property / plugin configuration parameter specifying the minimum score threshold for recommended libraries produced by org.machanism.machai.bindex.Picker. Default: 0.9.

examples.description: Requires recommendations to have a score of at least 0.95.

customizations.name: bindex.register.url
customizations.description: Optional system property / plugin configuration parameter providing a registration/lookup endpoint used by org.machanism.machai.bindex.Picker to look up and/or register bindex metadata during the recommendation phase.

examples.description: Configures the picker to use a remote registry endpoint for bindex metadata lookup/registration.
Command-line invocation configuring both phases and using a prompt file.
Example Maven POM configuration providing parameters via plugin configuration.
